targets.query:
import "strings"

getTestData = (data, testName) => {
  return data
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r.testName == testName)
}

reconstructRows = (data, valType, testName) => {
  return data
    |> first()
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with valType: valType, testGroup: "${workload}", testName: testName}))
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with testId: r.testGroup + "." + r.testName }))
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with metric0: r.metric }))
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with metric: r.metric0 }))
}

calculate = (data, testName, valType, fn) => {
  dataForTestName = getTestData(data: data, testName: testName)

  r = dataForTestName
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r.metric == "read")
    |> fn()

  u = dataForTestName
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r.metric == "update")
    |> fn()

  return reconstructRows(data: union(tables: [r, u]), valType: valType, testName: testName)
}

calculateOverall = (data, testName, valType, fn) => {
  dataForTestName = getTestData(data: data, testName: testName)

  o = dataForTestName
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with metric: "overall" }))
    |> fn()

  return reconstructRows(data: o, valType: valType, testName: testName)
}

calcQuantile = (data, testName, qVal) => {
  dataForTestName = getTestData(data: data, testName: testName)

  r = dataForTestName
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r.metric == "read")
    |> quantile(q: qVal)

  u = dataForTestName
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r.metric == "update")
    |> quantile(q: qVal)

  return reconstructRows(data: union(tables: [r, u]), valType: "p${qVal * 100.0}", testName: testName)
}

calcQuantileOverall = (data, testName, qVal) => {
  dataForTestName = getTestData(data: data, testName: testName)

  o = dataForTestName
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with metric: "overall" }))
    |> quantile(q: qVal)

  return reconstructRows(data: o, valType: "p${qVal * 100.0}", testName: testName)
}

allData = from(bucket: "client_metrics_raw")
  |> range(start: -10y)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
    testGroup: strings.split(v: r.filename, t: ".")[0],
    testName: strings.split(v: r.filename, t: ".")[1],
  }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
    testId: (r.testGroup + "." + r.testName),
    _value: r._value / 1000.0
  }))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.testGroup == "${workload}" and r.metric != "cleanup")


getResults = (testName) => {
  return union(tables: [
    calculate(data: allData, testName: testName, valType: "mean", fn: mean),
    calculateOverall(data: allData, testName: testName, valType: "mean", fn: mean),
    calculate(data: allData, testName: testName, valType: "min", fn: min),
    calculateOverall(data: allData, testName: testName, valType: "min", fn: min),
    calculate(data: allData, testName: testName, valType: "max", fn: max),
    calculateOverall(data: allData, testName: testName, valType: "max", fn: max),
    calcQuantile(data: allData, testName: testName, qVal: 0.99),
    calcQuantileOverall(data: allData, testName: testName, qVal: 0.99),
    calcQuantile(data: allData, testName: testName, qVal: 0.90),
    calcQuantileOverall(data: allData, testName: testName, qVal: 0.90),
    calcQuantile(data: allData, testName: testName, qVal: 0.75),
    calcQuantileOverall(data: allData, testName: testName, qVal: 0.75),
    calcQuantile(data: allData, testName: testName, qVal: 0.50),
    calcQuantileOverall(data: allData, testName: testName, qVal: 0.50)
  ])
}

unionedData = union(tables: [
    getResults(testName: "T1"),
    getResults(testName: "T2"),
    getResults(testName: "T3")
  ])
  |> drop(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_start", "_stop", "bucket", "filename", "metric"])

pivotedData = unionedData
  |> pivot(rowKey:["testId", "metric0"], columnKey: ["valType"], valueColumn: "_value")

pivotedData

import "strings"

firstTestName = "T1"

getStartTime = (data, testName) => {
  return data
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r.testName == testName)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r.metric == "read" or r.metric == "update")
    |> first()
    |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)
}

timeDiff = (t1, t2) => {
  return if exists t2._time then uint(v: t2._time) - uint(v: t1._time) else uint(v: 0)
}

getTestData = (data, testName) => {
  t1Start = getStartTime(data: data, testName: firstTestName)
  t2Start = getStartTime(data: data, testName: testName)
  diff = timeDiff(t1: t1Start, t2: t2Start)
  return data
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r.testName == testName)
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: time(v: uint(v: r._time) - diff)}))
}

allData = from(bucket: "client_metrics_raw")
  |> range(start: -10y)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with 
    testGroup: strings.split(v: r.filename, t: ".")[0],
    testName: strings.split(v: r.filename, t: ".")[1],
  }))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.testGroup == "${workload}" and r.metric != "cleanup")

t1Data = getTestData(data: allData, testName: "T1")
t2Data = getTestData(data: allData, testName: "T2")

union(tables: [t1Data, t2Data])
  |> rename(columns: {filename: "testId"})
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
      testId: (r.testGroup + "." + r.testName),
      _value: r._value / 1000.0
    }))

import "strings"

firstTestName = "T1"

getStartTime = (data, testName) => {
  return data
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r.testName == testName)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r.metric == "read" or r.metric == "update")
    |> first()
    |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)
}

timeDiff = (t1, t2) => {
  return if exists t2._time then uint(v: t2._time) - uint(v: t1._time) else uint(v: 0)
}

getTestData = (data, testName) => {
  t1Start = getStartTime(data: data, testName: firstTestName)
  t2Start = getStartTime(data: data, testName: testName)
  diff = timeDiff(t1: t1Start, t2: t2Start)
  return data
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r.testName == testName)
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: time(v: uint(v: r._time) - diff)}))
}

allData = from(bucket: "client_metrics_raw")
  |> range(start: -10y)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with 
    testGroup: strings.split(v: r.filename, t: ".")[0],
    testName: strings.split(v: r.filename, t: ".")[1],
  }))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.testGroup == "${workload}" and r.metric != "cleanup")

t1Data = getTestData(data: allData, testName: "T1")
t2Data = getTestData(data: allData, testName: "T2")

unioned = union(tables: [t1Data, t2Data])
  |> rename(columns: {filename: "testId"})
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
      testId: (r.testGroup + "." + r.testName),
      _value: r._value / 1000.0
    }))

unioned
  |> group(columns: ["testId"])
  |> window(every: 100ms)
  |> mean()
  |> duplicate(column: "_stop", as: "_time")
  |> window(every: inf)
